Question
========

To test the null hypothesis that two population averages are equal, we drew a sample from both populations, one sized of n = 10, the other of n = 8. The critical range of the two samples T-test for independent samples is then, at a two-sided risk of 5%, equal to

Answerlist
----------

* < -2.1199, 2.1199 >
* < -2.1009, 2.1009 >
* < -∞,-2.1199] ∪ [2.1199, ∞ >
* < -∞,-2.1009] ∪ [2.1009, ∞ >

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* < -2.1199, 2.1199 >: Incorrect
* < -2.1009, 2.1009 >: Incorrect
* < -∞,-2.1199] ∪ [2.1199, ∞ >: Correct
* < -∞,-2.1009] ∪ [2.1009, ∞ >: Incorrect
